pr_title: SLP accepts org/space names with slash

timeline.message:
SLP accepts org/space names with slash

This is a regression on our side for SLP.
In the past, this scenario was working. Most probably,
the regiression comes from migration to WebMVC from Jersey

Jira: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-2291

timeline.bodyText: It should be check does handle correctly plus(+) signs in org/space names. We had previously another issues related with url decode/encode.
timeline.author: theghost5800

replies.bodyText: It accepts + sign. This is covered by integration tests.
replies.author: boyan-velinov
